summary:
Avery Hernandez is a highly skilled Full Stack Developer with a Bachelor of Engineering degree in Software Engineering from the Institute of Technology. With over 4 years of experience in the field, Avery has developed a strong proficiency in a range of programming languages, including Python, Java, TypeScript, and Go. He has also demonstrated expertise in web development frameworks such as Django, Node.js, FastAPI, React, and Express.

Avery's achievements include building a CI/CD system using AWS, which improved MTTR by 25%, and designing and implementing a monitoring stack with Go. He has also successfully migrated legacy VM clusters to GCP with zero downtime and reduced error rates by 40% through observability tooling.

Throughout his experience, Avery has worked as a Full Stack Developer and Backend Engineer at CodeSpring and BrightHub, respectively. He has led teams to deliver features and projects on time, and has demonstrated his ability to work effectively in fast-paced environments. Avery's technical skills also extend to data analysis and machine learning, with proficiency in TensorFlow, SQL, Pandas, and PyTorch.

Overall, Avery is a highly skilled and accomplished developer with a strong technical foundation and a proven track record of delivering high-quality results.
